participants.name: Jennifer Stevenson
participants.title: IT Manager at Arizona Dept. of Transportation

messages.message: Where do I report a missing street sign at the intersection of 32nd and Camelback?
You can send an email to azdot.gov.

I sent one before for too short traffic lights and never got a response. California gave up 6 mil in red light tickets by making the yellow light a half a second longer. Source: http://www.laweekly.com/news/yay-longer-yellow-traffic-light-phases-now-required-by-caltrans-5275044
Will the city get that money back because people will be safer and less stressed? Hard to measure.
Will the city get that money back because people will be safer and less stressed? Hard to measure.
